st: Tor Do Na Wo Qasam Jo Khai Hai
s:
Tor Do Na Wo Qasam Jo Khai Hai
Kabhi Kabhi Yad Karlene Mai Kya Burai Hai
Yad Ap Ko Kiye Bina Raha Bhi To Nahi Jata
Dil Mai Jaga Apne Aisi Jo Banai Hai

st: Jab Aapka Naam Zaban Par Aata Hai
s:
Jab Aapka Naam Zaban Par Aata Hai
Pata Nahi Dil Kyo Muskurata Hai
Tasalli Hoti Hai Mann Ko Koi To Hai Apna
Jo Haste Hue Har Waqt Yaad Aata Hai

st: Kai Baar Jaan Bujh Kar Dil Toda Uska
s:
Kai Baar Jaan Bujh Kar Dil Toda Uska
Shayad Ab Wo Faisla Kar Le Juda Hone Ka
Par Har Baar Wo Paas Aate Gaye
Meri Galtiyon Ko Apna Banate Gaye

st: Yun Dosti K Naam Ko Rusvaa Na Kijiye
s:
Yun Dosti K Naam Ko Rusvaa Na Kijiye
Tark-e-Ta'alluqaat Ka Charcha Na Kijiye
Jurm-O-Sitam Ka Paas Bhi Ulfat Mein Shart Hai
Palkon Ko Aansuon Se Bhigoya Na Kijiye
Aisaa Na Ho Ummeed Se Rishta Hi Toot Jaaye
Har Roz Mujhse Vaada-e-Fardaa Na Kijiye
Hamdard Jis Ko Apna Samajhte Rahe Hain Aap
Us Ka Hi Zindagi Mein Bharosa Na Kijiye

st: Re Mere Rishte Ko Kya Naam Du,
s:
Re Mere Rishte Ko Kya Naam Du,
Yeh Naam Du Ya Woh Naam Du,
Is Duniya Ki Bhid Mei Naam Ho Jate Hai Badnaam,
Kyun Na Apne Rishte Ko Benaam Hi Rehne Du…

st: Kuchh Rista Upar Bante Hai
s:
Kuchh Rista Upar Bante Hai
Kuchh Rista Log Banaate Hai
Who Log Bahut Khaas Hote Hai
Jo Bina Ristey, Rista Nibhaate Hai

st: Yu Nazar Ki Baat Ki Aur Dil Chura Gaye
s:
Yu Nazar Ki Baat Ki Aur Dil Chura Gaye
Andhero Ke Saaye Mein Dhadkan Suna Gaye
Hum To Samajhe Te Ajnabi Aapko
Par Aap To Hume Apna Bana Gaye

st: Rishta Banao To Dhoka Mat Dena
s:
Rishta Banao To Dhoka Mat Dena
Kisi Ko Ansoo Ka Tohfa Mat Dena
Dil Se Roye Koi Tumhe Yaad Karke
Aisa Kisi Ko Tum Moka Mat Dena

st: Rishta Banao To Dhoka Mat Dena
s:
Rishta Banao To Dhoka Mat Dena
Kisi Ko Ansoo Ka Tohfa Mat Dena
Dil Se Roye Koi Tumhe Yaad Karke
Aisa Kisi Ko Tum Moka Mat Dena

st: Tumse Doori Ka Ehsaas Jab Satane Laga
s:
Tumse Doori Ka Ehsaas Jab Satane Laga
Tere Saath Guzra Har Lamha Yaad Aane Laga
Jabbhi Tumhe Bhulne Ki Koshish Ki
Ae Dost Tu Dil Ke Aur Paas Aane Laga

st: Kisi K Khayalo M Hmara Chehra Nahi Aaya
s:
Kisi K Khayalo M Hmara Chehra Nahi Aaya
Chand N B Hmko Aj Uhi Bhula Diya
Koi Tara B Hme Ab Tuta Hua Nahi Dikh Raha
Lagta H Aj Kisi Apne N Hme Yad Nahi Kiya

st: Haqikat Ho Tum Kaise Tujhe Sapna Kahu
s:
Haqikat Ho Tum Kaise Tujhe Sapna Kahu
Tere Har Dard Ko Ab Me Apna Kahu
Sab Kuch Qurban Hai Mere Yar Tujh Par
Kaun Hai Tere Siva Jise Me Apna Kahu

st: Itni Badi Duniya Me Koi Sahara Nahi
s:
Itni Badi Duniya Me Koi Sahara Nahi
Apno Ki Bheed Me Koi Hamara Nahi
Kadam Ladkhdaye To Unka Daman Tham Liya
Wo Bhi Haskar Bole Dost Ye Daman Tumhara Nahi

st: Rang Hai Khushboo Hai Saba Hai Koi
s:
Rang Hai Khushboo Hai Saba Hai Koi
Mausam-E-Gul Ki Tarah Mujhse Mila Hai Koi
Husn Ho Kar Mohabbat Hai Wafa Hai Koi
Aisa Lagta Hai Zamane Se Juda Hai Koi
Apni Pehchaan Hui Jati Hai Mushkil Mujh Ko,
Yun Aaj Meri Taraf Dekh Raha Hai Koi

st: Kab Kon Kisi Ka Hota Hai
s:
Kab Kon Kisi Ka Hota Hai
Sub Choote Rishtey Naate Hai
Sub Dil Rakhney Ki Batein Hai
Sub Asal Roop Chupatey Hai
Mohabbat Ke Khali Log Yaha
Lafzo Ke Teer Chalete Hai
Ek Bar Nigahon Mai Agar
Phir Sari Zindagi Rulate Hai
Woh Jis Ne Diya Hai Asshk Humey
Ab Woh Hi Hum Ko Bhool Jatey Hai

st: Unone Khud K Jaban Ko Mod Diya
s:
Unone Khud K Jaban Ko Mod Diya
Nadani M Hmare Dil Ko Tod Diya
Ab To Hmare Ansu B Nahi Rukte Unki Yaad Ma
Qki Apnone Hi Hmse Muh Mod Diya

st: Mushkiloon Se Aap Ki Mulaqat Na Ho
s:
Mushkiloon Se Aap Ki Mulaqat Na Ho
Udas Betho Kabhi Aisi Baat Na Ho
Dua Hey Ke Khushiyoon Se Saje Zindagi Aapki
Bas Hame Pukar Lena Agar Koi Saath Na Hai

st: Aapne Dil Ke Baat Hum Unse Keh Nahin Sakte
s:
Aapne Dil Ke Baat Hum Unse Keh Nahin Sakte
Bin Kahe Bhi Jee Nahin Sakte
Eh Khuda Aaisi Takdeer Bana Ke Who Khud Aakar Yeh Kahe
Hum Aapke Bina Reh Nahin Sakte

st: Dard Me Koi Mousam Pyara Nahi Hota,
s:
Dard Me Koi Mousam Pyara Nahi Hota,
Dil Ho Pyasa To Pani Se Gujara Nahi Hota.
Koi Dekhe To Humari Bebasi,
Hum Sabhi K Ho Jate Hain
Par Koi Humara Nahi Hota.

st: Aap Pe Kurbaan Hmari Yaari Hai
s:
Aap Pe Kurbaan Hmari Yaari Hai
Hanske Mar Jaane Ki Tayyari Hai
Yeh Silsila Na Khatam Ho Humaari Dosti Ka
Humne To Yaad Kar Liya Ab Aapki Baari Hai

st: Kab Maine Kaha Ki Chandi Aur Sona Chahiye,
s:
Kab Maine Kaha Ki Chandi Aur Sona Chahiye,
Bas Aap Ke Dil Mein Ek Chota Sa Kona Chahiye,
Keh Sakain Jise Hum Dil Se Apna,
Aisa Bhi To Koi Dost Hona Chahiye.

st: Kanto Ko Chubana Sikhaya Nahi Jata
s:
Kanto Ko Chubana Sikhaya Nahi Jata
Phool Ko Khilna Sikhaya Nahi Jata
Koii Ban Jata Hai Khud Ba Khud
Kisi Ko Apna Banaya Nahi Jata

st: Ye Nahi Gam Ke Qasam Apni Bhulai Tum Ne
s:
Ye Nahi Gam Ke Qasam Apni Bhulai Tum Ne
Gam Te Ye Hai Ke Raqeebon Se Nibhai Tum Ne
Koi Ranjish Thi Ager Tum Ko To Mujh Se Kehte
Baat Apas Ki Kiun Sab Ko Batai Tum Ne

st: Udas Lamhon Ka Na Koi Malal Rakna
s:
Udas Lamhon Ka Na Koi Malal Rakna
Tofan Mein Bhi Wajod Sambhal Rakna
Kisi K Liye Shart-e-Zindagi Tum Ho
Kisi Ki Khatir Apna Khayal Rakna

st: Tere Intezaar May Choda Duniya Ka Sath,
s:
Tere Intezaar May Choda Duniya Ka Sath,
Tere Intezaar May Choda Apno Ka Sath,
Jb Tujhey Jana Hi Tha Tu Kyu Diya Wado Ka Sath,
Rah Gaya Ab May Bs Apno Gamo K Saath…

st: Phool Ki Shuruvat Kali Se Hoti Hai
s:
Phool Ki Shuruvat Kali Se Hoti Hai
Zindagi Ki Shuruvat Pyar Se Hoti Hai
Pyar Ki Shuruvat Apno Se Hoti Hai Aur
Apno Ki Shuruvat Aapse Hoti Hai

st: Zindagi Ko Ek Kalpana Samjhoo
s:
Zindagi Ko Ek Kalpana Samjhoo
Raat Ko Sach Subah Ko Sapna Samjhoo
Bhulana Chatay Ho Agar Sabhie Ghamoo Ko Tu
Zindagi Main Kisi Ek Ko Apna Samjho

st: Ye Dil Bhi Ajib Hai,Gairo Ko Apna Banana Chahta Hai
s:
Ye Dil Bhi Ajib Hai,Gairo Ko Apna Banana Chahta Hai
Jo Rishta Naamumkin Saa Hai,Use Hi Apnana Chahta Hai
Koi Hota Hai Jo Yaad Rehkar Bhi Yaad Nahi Karta
Aur Ek Hum Hai Jo Roz Yaad Karke Bhi Use Bhuana Chahte Hai

st: Hasrate Reh Jayegi Apke Bin Adhuri
s:
Hasrate Reh Jayegi Apke Bin Adhuri
Zindagi Na Hogi Apke Bin Poori
Ab Aur Sahi Jaye Na Ye Doori
Jeene K Liye Apka Saath He Bahut Zaruri

st: Aapki Dosti Pe Naaz Hai Hame
s:
Aapki Dosti Pe Naaz Hai Hame
Kal Tha Jitna Bharosa Utna Aaj Hai Hame!
Dost Wo Nahi Jo Khushi Me Sath De
Dost Wahi Jo Har Pal Apnepan Ka Ehsas De!!!

st: Zindagi Ko Aik Pal Apna Samjho
s:
Zindagi Ko Aik Pal Apna Samjho
Raat Ko Sach Or Din Ko Sapna Samjho
Bhulana Chahte Ho Agar Sabhi Ghamo Ko
To Zindagi Mein Kisi Aik Ko Apna Samjho

st: Palkon Main Qaid Kuch Sapne Hain,
s:
Palkon Main Qaid Kuch Sapne Hain,
Kuch Bayganay Kuch Apne Hain,
Na Janay Kia Kashish Hai In Khayalon Main,
Woh Ghair Ho K Bhi Kitnay Apne Hain…

st: Sadgi Main Ek Ada Itni Pyari Lagi
s:
Sadgi Main Ek Ada Itni Pyari Lagi
Apki Dosti Humko Subse Nirali Lagi
Yeh Na Tootay Kabhi Yahi Dua Hai
Kyn Ke Yahi Is Duniya Mai Hum Ko Hamari Lagi

st: Phir Satao Ke Satane Mein Maza Aata Hai
s:
Phir Satao Ke Satane Mein Maza Aata Hai
Rooth Jao Ke Manane Mein Maza Aata Hai
Apna Kah dena Kisi Ko Bari Baat NAhi
Apna Kah Kar Nibhane Mein Maza Aata Hai

st: Qarib Se Tumhe Dekha To Apna Paya
s:
Qarib Se Tumhe Dekha To Apna Paya
Jab Tumhe Dosti Mein Azmaya To Apna Paya
Tumhe Kya Name Dun Samjh Mein Nahi Aaya
Dosti, Pyar, Zindage Ya Apna Saaya…

st: Hum App Ki Yaad Main Udas Hain
s:
Hum App Ki Yaad Main Udas Hain
Bas App Say Milnay Ki Ass Hay
Chahay Dost Kitnay Hi Kion Na Hoon
Maray Liye Tu App Hi Sab Se Khas Hain

st: Karwato Mai Guzar Jati Hai Sari Ratt
s:
Karwato Mai Guzar Jati Hai Sari Ratt
Muhabbat Kai Cheez Hai Mai Jan Liya
Khawab Ankho Se Kabhi Na Dor Ho
Pheli Nazar Ki Muhabbat Ko Pehchan Liya
Tuje Dekh K Dil Dharakta Hai Maira
Mai Ne Tuj Ko Apna Man Liya

st: Uljhi Hwi Baat Ko Suljhane Ki Zid Na Karo
s:
Uljhi Hwi Baat Ko Suljhane Ki Zid Na Karo
Jo Na Ho Apna Use Apnane Ki Zid Nakar
Is Samandr Mai Toofan Bohat Ata Hai
Is Ke Sahil Pe Ghr Banane Ki Zid Na Kar

st: Apna Pan Bhi Iss Beganey Pan Main Hai
s:
Apna Pan Bhi Iss Beganey Pan Main Hai
Pura Aalam Eik Dewaney Pan Main Hai
Yeh Ju Tum Se Main Anjan Bana Pirta Hoon
Sari Baat Issi Anjaney Pan Main Hai
